title: SpaceForest Successfully Test-Fires Upgraded Hybrid Rocket Engine
summary:
Polish suborbital launch services company SpaceForest has successfully test-fired an enhanced version of its SF-1000 hybrid rocket engine. The project was supported by the European Space Agency through its Boost! Programme. Founded in 2011, SpaceForest is developing PERUN, an 11.5-metre suborbital rocket designed to carry 50-kilogram payloads to altitudes of up to 150 kilometres. To […]
The post SpaceForest Successfully Test-Fires Upgraded Hybrid Rocket Engine appeared first on European Spaceflight.
